metadata.description:
Floop Chrominator Stereo Analog Saturator with five selectable modes (Soft, Even, Clip, Warm, Odd). Adds warmth, presence, and character from subtle color to heavier drive.
Features oversampling, filters, tilt EQ, auto-gain, and smooth transitions.

version.author: Flora Tarantino (Floop's Reaper Script)
version.changelog: v1.1.0 + Bug fixes and improvements. + Oversampling options: 1x, 2x, 4x with FIR anti-aliasing (HQ 17-tap).

metadata.description: Floop Studio Trainer Practice your instrument inside Reaper using either an audio track or the metronome. Set repetitions and BPM increments to practice hands-free.
